Title: An End to the Suffering
Description:
The key to lifting the curse of this place rests in the final death of Darkmaster Gandling.

Do it, $p, and make him suffer!
PortraitGiverText: Kill the Darkmaster to lift the curse.
RewardText:
Behold my true form.

I owe you a debt, one which I can never repay. But, I thank you for lifting the curse off of my family.

Kel'Thuzad, the Lich King, and now Darkmaster Gandling -- all are dead.

Perhaps now I too can find some semblance of peace.
